recipes.steps:
cut apples into pieces and put into a baking dish. 
 combine sugar, flour, water, butter and salt into another bowl. 
 add mixture ontop of apples in dish and bake until brown.

Combine the flour and salt into bowl. 
 slice cold butter and mix into the bowl of flour and salt until clumps form.
 add cold water a tablespoon at a time.
 roll dough into a cirlce and press into a pan.
eat the ice cream out of the tub... this is a joke submission
